resources.string: What type of wines are you interested in?
What varietals are you interested in?

Visitors to Reata at Jamieson Ranch are treated to a hospitality experience like no other in the Napa Valley.

 JRV Signature Tasting - $15 per person. Enjoy our latest releases of award winning wines in a specially tailored wine tasting.

 JRV Reserve Tasting - $25 per person. Rejoice in our leading releases of award winning reserve wines in a uniquely customized wine tasting experience.
